Yes, I do

11 Jun 2018 Yes, I do

Yes, I do

I love you, she said. Yes, I do.

I love you, she said. 
Yes, I do.

I do, for you didn’t let me go.
I do, for I told you no.
I do, for every moment was ours.
I do, for you talked to me for hours.

Can I be a bird ?

02 Jun 2018 Can I be a bird ?

Can I be a bird ?

Can I be a bird With the wings to fly Not of feather But the desire to sway high

Can I be a bird 
With the wings to fly
Not of feather
But the desire to sway high

Some Say ...

30 Mar 2018 Some Say “..

Some Say “..

She is beauty Some say she is wine Some just pretended Some cried that she is mine

She is beauty
Some say she is wine
Some just pretended 
Some cried that she is mine
